conbody.p: User Management allows a Security Administrator to create and delete users, assign users with roles, and manage password functions. The mapping of roles, target groups, and users is also performed in this application.

Available operations for Security Administrator:
Create of Users
Edit Existing Users
Assign User Roles and Target Groups
Change User Password
Delete Users
Enable/Disable Users
Duplicate a User
Filter Users
Revoke User Certificate
Retrieve User Credentials
